name: MEC Uplink Trekking Poles - Unisex
categories: Uplink Aluminum 3 Part Poles Cork Grips
description: For tough day hikes and rough traverses. Cork grips are a luxurious design detail, and the wrist strap is carefully shaped for all-day comfort. Sturdy and strong, they keep you balanced under the weight of your pack, and save your knees from gravity's impact.7075-T6 aluminum construction is light, durable and economical.3-section design is packable on backpacks or in luggage with adjustable lengths from 105-140cm.Powerlock 3.0 mechanism is strong and easy to secure.Comfortable cork grips with ergonomic webbing loops.Mid-sized trekking basket reduces snagging, with a carbide tip.
